text: Niscaya'i tomadera pariksa kara habe tomadera dhanasampatti o tomadera lokajanera madhyame, ara nihsandeha tomara sunate pabe tomadera age yadera grantha deya hayeche tadera theke ebam yara sarika kare tadera theke aneka galigalaja. Ara yadi tomara dhairya dharana karo o bhayabhakti karo tabe niscaya seti habe satsahasera kaja.
